message:
WARNING!

If you play video games — please note that this tool runs on AutoHotkey, which may be prohibited in games, including running in the background, due to players using .ahk scripts to gain unfair advantages over other players.

To avoid issues with game anti-cheat systems, it is recommended to disable all AutoHotkey processes before playing.

The risk is highest in the following games: Marvel Rivals, Apex Legends, games with BattlEye anti-cheat.

prepare.fonts_not_found:
Fonts used by the utility are missing from the system.
Close this window to obtain them.

Fonts to install:

warnings.remove_confirm: Do you really want to delete the recipe “{}”?
warnings.exists: A custom recipe with section name “{}” already exists.
warnings.exists_internal:
A recipe with section name “{}” already exists in the internal library.

Rename the custom recipe section.
warnings.xcompose_cannot_be_edited: Recipes extracted from “.XCompose” files cannot be deleted or edited.
warnings.invalid_name: Name must contain only English letters “a–Z”, digits (not at the beginning), and underscore “_”.

errors.read_error: Error reading recipe list: section {}, recipe {}.
errors.read_error_reinit: Error reading recipe list: section {}, recipe {}.
errors.titles: Localized recipe name “{}” contains an error (empty language code or other error).

warnings.incompatible_with_telex: Cannot activate alternative mode “{}” while {@default:TELEX}-like mode “{}” is active.

description:
Combination: {var:Window}{var:LeftAlt} F
Most library symbols have their own tags, which are variants of the symbol name that can be used for insertion through search.
Enter a tag completely or partially (or entry name) to insert the corresponding symbol. You can enter multiple queries at once, separating them with commas. Examples:
 • “hellenic capital letter lambda”, “hel lam”, “hel_c_let_l_lambda” → “Λ”
 • “дез ди, !дез ди”, “lam, !lam” → “𐐔𐐼”, “Λλ”.
 • “reference_mark” → “※”.

Notes:
 • The shorter the query — the less precise it is.
 • The “!” sign at the beginning of a query tells the search to use case sensitivity.
 • Simple regular expressions are supported, for example:
    ‣ “fut.*?\s+\S+al” → “ᚺ” (Hagalaz rune)
    ‣ “az$” → “ᛞ” (Mannaz rune)
    ‣ “^фр” → “₣” (Franc).

When searching, you can specify the desired glyph variation by adding “::<VARIATION>” to the end of the query, for example: “lat m::fraktur” → “𝔐”.
    ‣ “^фра” → “₣” (Franc).
 • modifier — модификатор, мо, mo.
 • superscript — верхний индекс, ви, sup.
 • subscript — нижний индекс, ни, sub.
 • italic — курсив, ку, it.
 • italicBold — курсив полужирный, куп, itb.
 • bold — полужирный, п, b.
 • fraktur — фрактур, ф, f.
 • frakturBold — полужирный фрактур, пф, fb.
 • script — рукописный, р, s.
 • scriptBold — полужирный рукописный, пр, sb.
 • doubleStruck — ds.
 • sansSerif — без засечек, бз, ss.
 • sansSerifItalic — курсив без засечек, кубз, ssit.
 • sansSerifItalicBold — курсив полужирный без засечек, купбз, ssitb.
 • sansSerifBold — полужирный без засечек, пбз, ssb.
 • monospace — моноширинный, м, m.
 • smallCapital — капитель, к, sc.
 • small — маленький, мал, sm.
 • combining — комбинируемый, ко, c.
 • uncombined — некомбинируемый, неко, uc.
 • fullwidth — полноширинный, пш, fw.

The search field supports the ability to call some functions and methods, including:
 • “\” or “/Reload” — restart the program.
 • “/Exit” — close the program.
 • “/ChrLib.Print” — generate and open an .HTML file with a list of library symbols.
 • “/MyRecipes.Update” — re-initialize custom recipes.
 • “/Update.Get” or “/Update.Repair” — get update or repair current version.
 • “/KbdBinder.Init” — re-initialize layouts and bindings.

warnings.incompatible_with_alternative_modes: Cannot activate {@default:TELEX}-like mode “{}” while alternative mode “{}” is active.

user_defined_recipes.recipe_or_result_has_empty_value: Recipe or result for entry “{}” in file “{}” has an empty value and will be skipped.
user_defined_recipes.recipe_format_is_invalid: Invalid recipe entry format “{}” in file “{}”.
